accueil.texte: Here live the ancient legends, whispered by forests, inscribed in grimoires, and passed down by voice.

legendes.apprenti_sorcier: He was only sixteen winters old when the grimoire called him.
legendes.licorne_aubepine: In the ancient forests, a unicorn watches over lost souls.
legendes.foret_noire: The trees still whisper the old oaths.

apropos.texte: This site is a modern grimoire dedicated to ancient legends, told through words, images, and voice.

don.texte: Support the grimoire by making a donation.
